WorkItem.Description:
In ZipWorker.Extract, any exceptions when reading the zip file are caught.

Sure, I can check whether ExceptionMessage has been set, but the examples don't show that, and other problems generate real exceptions, as far as I can tell.

Wouldn't it be better, if the ZipWorker re-throws the exception, after doing its cleanup?
WorkItem.Summary: Exceptions from reading zip in danger of getting ignored
